steps.caption: You're in your prime. 10th prime birthday 🎂! P.S. You're on the cent. Do you remember...
...that time we met and talked for 3 hours over ☕?
...that time you said you had a lot of homework?
...that time we saw the tapirs at the Woodland Park Zoo?
...that time we had smores at Golden Gardens?
...that time we went to Virgina for David and Leah's wedding?
...that time we played Scrabble and you won a 💍?
...that time we had a ❄️ball fight outside the courthouse in Fort Wayne?
...that time you and your friends dressed up in 🚽 paper?
...that time you walked the UW campus in your 🎓 and gown for the last time as a student?
...that time you tapped me on the shoulder behind a lake east of Portland?
...that time we took a canoe ride on a beautiful summer day?
...that time we sailed the Napali Coast?
...that time we walked down to the 🐢s and talked about San Francisco?
...that time we became city folk?
...that time we went to the SF ballet?
...that time we hiked through the jungle beneath the 🐒s?
...that time we rode the cable car to an Italian dinner 🚎🍝🇮🇹?
...that time we had a 👶?
...that time we bought a 🏡?
